mapper.insert:
insert into nyt_chargeitem_info ( ID, CHANGE_FLAG, CHARGEITEM_GUID, CHARGEITEM_NAME, CHARGEITEM_BASIS, REDUCTION_DESC, ORDERNUM, P_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, REMARKS, IS_DELETE ) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.changeFlag}, #{item.chargeitemGuid}, #{item.chargeitemName}, #{item.chargeitemBasis}, #{item.reductionDesc}, #{item.ordernum}, #{item.pId}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.remarks}, #{item.isDelete} )
